for _ in xrange(input()):
    a=raw_input()
    b=raw_input()
    if a.count('0')==0 or a.count('1')==0:
        print 'Unlucky Chef'
        continue
    c1=0
    c2=0
    for i in range(len(a)):
        if a[i]=='1' and b[i]=='0':
            c1+=1
        if a[i]=='0' and b[i]=='1':
            c2+=1
    print 'Lucky Chef'
    print max(c1,c2)
